about_the_game:
Summary: A teenager falls from an alternate universe and attempts to survive in the present universe by looking
for shelter in a forest during the winter. Attempt to figure out how to return to his world, but
destiny had other plans, will our protagonist survive, will he receive assistance from others, and
will he be able to return to his universe?

The player interacts with and battles with yeti animals as the protagonist struggles to survive after falling into the winter wilderness. After moving on to the following cut scene, The Assailants, the antagonistic gang, kidnap the protagonist. In the first episode, the protagonist makes it back to their hub. In order to defend himself and flee from their base, the player begins interacting with and engaging in combat with the enemy gang members. The protagonist will learn some information about him along that process.

Third Person Perspective Gameplay
Cut Scenes
Shooter Gameplay
Action-Adventure Gameplay
Interactive Gameplay

content_descriptors.notes: There is no sexual acts/sexual assault/non-consensual sex/drug and alcohol abuse or self harm. There is violence when player fight with enemies

detailed_description:
Early Beta Access

Hello, gamers Only episode 1 of the narrative is included in this game. Its early access game. Based on user feedback and support, will plan to release the final version of game. I hope you enjoy the game and help us. We are grateful. Secernate Games.


About the Game

Summary: A teenager falls from an alternate universe and attempts to survive in the present universe by looking for shelter in a forest during the winter. Attempt to figure out how to return to his world, but destiny had other plans, will our protagonist survive, will he receive assistance from others, and will he be able to return to his universe? The player interacts with and battles with yeti animals as the protagonist struggles to survive after falling into the winter wilderness. After moving on to the following cut scene, The Assailants, the antagonistic gang, kidnap the protagonist. In the first episode, the protagonist makes it back to their hub. In order to defend himself and flee from their base, the player begins interacting with and engaging in combat with the enemy gang members. The protagonist will learn some information about him along that process. Third Person Perspective Gameplay Cut Scenes Shooter Gameplay Action-Adventure Gameplay Interactive Gameplay

name: The Assailant's Arrival

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 1.7 GHZ Processor
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 8.1 Level Graphics Card (Requires Support for SSE)
  • DirectX: Version 8.1
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
  • Sound Card: NA
  • VR Support: PC/Laptop
  • Additional Notes: Mouse, Keyboard
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Pentium 4 Processor (3.0 GHZ, or better)
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9 Level Graphics Card
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
  • Sound Card: NA
  • VR Support: PC/Laptop
  • Additional Notes: Mouse, Keyboard
